item.description:
*** 2 9/11 Truth events at this Festival - see bottom! ***
===============================================

Are you frustrated at the loss of freedom and responsibility in America, while the growth of government and taxes continues unabated? Do you want to live in strong communities where your rights are respected, and people exercise responsibility for themselves and in their dealings with each other?

If you answered "yes" to those questions, then the Free State Project has a solution for you.

The FSP has a huge summer event each year called the Porcupine Freedom Festival at a family campground in Northern New-Hampshire. There will probably be 7-800 people there this year with speakers, music, dances, food, fun, campfires, parties - it's quite an event!

This year’s Porcupine Freedom Festival is gearing up to become the biggest and most successful so far! Approximately 500 advance tickets were sold! If you have not secured your lodging and admission, now is the time! (Lodging may still be available at the AltExpo (site #2) - write Dan@AltExpo.org for camping space)

Some of the people you’ll meet at Porcfest 2010:

* Stefan Molyneux of Free Domain Radio
* Michael Badnarik of constitutionpreservation.org
* Marc Stevens of Adventures in Legal Land
* Gov. Gary Johnson, chairman of Our America Initiative
* Larken Rose, a Tax Freedom advocate
* Jordan Page of jordanpagemusic.com

All of this, and much, much more, for only $25! Be a part of the biggest freedom celebration in the galaxy! Register today!

Go to the PorcFest 2010 website for all the details.
=========================================

2 events are scheduled of interest to truthers:

at the Alternatives Expo pavilion: site #2:

3PM Saturday - Mark Basile: "Scientists Solve the Crime of the Century!" about the WTC dust

4PM Saturday - Mark O'Conor: "We Are Chage in New-Hampshire"

Hope to see you there and maybe you can help New Hampshire freedom activists get active on our issues, too. There's a lot of interest in the formation of a WAC chapter here.
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the AltExpo site #2 - I'll be there
item.name: Porcupine Freedom Festival in Lancaster, NH
